 xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" xml:lang="en">
 IServerInfo serverInfos = (IServerInfo) request.getAttribute("serverInfos");
   String webFilesRoot = (String) request.getAttribute("WebFilesRoot"); %>

<jsp:include page="header.jsp 

 border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%">
 
   class="darker"> 
 
 
   class="lighter">
   id="menu" style="font-size: small;">
  [
  Server Informations
  |
    =" ?action=webAppsList">Web Applications list 
  ]
   
   
 
 
 

 
	<legend>Server Information</legend>
 style="text-align: left;" border="0">
	 
		 Server name 
		 title='Working directory:  serverInfos.getSystemProperties().get("user.dir") %>'> getServletConfig().getServletContext().getServerInfo() %> 
		 Servlet version 
		  getServletConfig().getServletContext().getMajorVersion() %>. getServletConfig().getServletContext().getMinorVersion() %> 
	 
	 
		 Temp file directory 
		  value=' serverInfos.getSystemProperties().get("java.io.tmpdir") %>  
		 Running as 
		 title='Home directory:  serverInfos.getSystemProperties().get("user.home") %>'> value=' serverInfos.getSystemProperties().get("user.name") %>  
	 
	 
		 Startup date 
		  value=" serverInfos.getStartupTime() %>" type="both" pattern="yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss  
		 colspan="2"> 
	 
 
 

 
	<legend>CPU and Memory</legend>
 style="text-align: left;" border="0">
 test=" serverInfos.getCpuCount() >= 0 %>">
	 
		 title="maximum number of processors available to the Java virtual machine">Number of CPUs 
		 align="center"> value=" serverInfos.getCpuCount() %>" type="number  
	 
 
	 
		 title="amount of free memory in the system">Free Memory 
		 class="number"> value=" serverInfos.getFreeMemory() %>" type="bytes  
	 
	 
		 title="total amount of memory in the Java Virtual Machine">Total Memory 
		 class="number"> value=" serverInfos.getTotalMemory() %>" type="bytes  
	 
 test=" serverInfos.getMaxMemory() >= 0 %>">
	 
		 title="maximum amount of memory that the Java virtual machine will attempt to use">Max Memory 
		 class="number"> value=" serverInfos.getMaxMemory() %>" type="bytes  
	 
 
 
 

 
	<legend>VM Info</legend>
 extracted properties from System.getProperties() (see JavaDoc) -->
 style="text-align: left;" border="0">
	 VM Info 
	 
		 Java VM 
		 
			 value=' serverInfos.getSystemProperties().get("java.vm.vendor") %> 
			 value=' serverInfos.getSystemProperties().get("java.vm.name") %> 
			 value=' serverInfos.getSystemProperties().get("java.vm.version") %> 
		 
	 
	 
		 Java RE 
		 
			  =" serverInfos.getSystemProperties().get("java.vendor.url") %>"> value=' serverInfos.getSystemProperties().get("java.vendor") %>  
			 value=' serverInfos.getSystemProperties().get("java.version") %>  @  value=' serverInfos.getSystemProperties().get("java.home") %> 
		 
	 
	 
		 Platform 
		 
			 value=' serverInfos.getSystemProperties().get("os.name") %> / value=' serverInfos.getSystemProperties().get("os.arch") %> 
			 value=' serverInfos.getSystemProperties().get("os.version") %> 
		 
	 
 
 

 style="text-align: center;"> type="button" onclick="window.location.reload()">Refresh  

 class="error"> value=' request.getAttribute("error") %>  
 class="message"> value=' request.getAttribute("message") %>  

 id="extraServerAttributes">
 items=" serverInfos.getServerSpecificData() %>" var="serverSpecificData" varStatus="status">
 java.util.Map.Entry serverSpecificData = (java.util.Map.Entry) pageContext.getAttribute("serverSpecificData"); %>
	 
		<legend > serverSpecificData.getKey() %></legend>
		 serverSpecificData.getValue() %>
